title: How many Grams of Silver Ring can a man wear? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: Merson says how many grams of silver ring can a man wear and this question indicates that machine knows that wearing a silver ring or jewelry solid which is totally true a man can use silver to wear but not in eating or drinking so you wanna wear a silver watch a silver ring silver glasses silver keychain no problem at all is there any specific weight for that the answer is no there is no limitation for the silver weight or amount that you use
